response.overview: Former coach and ESPN personality, Beano Cook, hosts this fantastic collection of unbelievable plays from the world of college football.  You'll shake your head in disbelief when you see what these college gridiron gladiators managed to pull off! We searched ESPN's extensive archives to find the most incredible plays from college competition. It's the most fantastic collection of great plays ever assembled, including early year footage of O.J. Simpson, Jim Brown, Bo Jackson and others. There are super runs and catches, heavy hits and fabulous finishes. Hail Mary passes and last second field goals that nobody can believe.  If it happened in college football, we found it - to make the most sensational video collection of college football plays ever!
response.title: Fantastic Football Plays
